instructions:
Call Summarization 2 MT
For this test, you will need to listen to information that is provided to you through the computer. We recommend using a headset or a set of quality speakers. You will then be asked a series of questions about each of the calls.

You should enter the information that the caller gives in the appropriate boxes on the computer screen. For example, you should enter the caller's first name, last name, street address, city, and/or telephone number in the boxes marked for that information. You should enter any vehicle identification number, License Plate, or Driver's License provided by the caller in the boxes marked for that information.

You may write notes about the calls in the box in the lower half of the screen labeled Notes to help you recall information about the call.

The information you record in any of the boxes on the screen will later be available to assist you in choosing the correct answer.

After each call is completed, follow the on-screen instructions to proceed to the questions about that call.

You will also need to respond to any emergency messages that appear in the bottom right corner of the screen by left clicking your mouse over the agency to be dispatched. Failing to respond to a decision-making message within 15 seconds after the message first appears will result in a lower score.

HOW TO RESPOND TO MULTIPLE-CHOICE QUESTION

With each question there will be four choices labeled A, B, C, and D. You can choose your response in one of three ways.

1. You can use your mouse to select your answers

2. You can use the up and down arrows to choose your response.

3. You can hold down the Alt key and then press either A, B, C, or D.

Press Alt+s to pause the background audio while accessing Emergency box. Press Alt+r to resume the background audio.

mcqQuestions.questionText: According to the caller, while they were at the store one of the men bought
The name of the bar where the men wanted the caller to meet them was the __________ bar.
The caller described herself as ___________ of the liquor store.
The vehicle that the men drove away in was described by the caller as being a
One of the men left his ______________ behind at the store.

emergencyQuestions.questionText: Several children are trapped inside an abandoned house.
Man falls from a ladder and breaks his arm.

mcqQuestions.questionText: The residents of the house where the suspicious activity is taking place were last seen leaving the house on last
The caller described the suspicious person’s vehicle as being colored _____________ stripes painted on its sides.
The age of the suspicious person was estimated by the caller to be _________ years old.
The suspicious person is said to have _________________hair.
The suspicious person was last seen by the caller in

options.text: the back yard of the house next door to 1461 Elder.
the back yard of the house across the street from1461 Elder.
the front yard of the house next door to 1461 Elder.
a vehicle in front of 1484 Mission.

emergencyQuestions.questionText: Heavy rain causes storm sewers to overflow.
Woman calls to say the public grammar school is burning.

mcqQuestions.questionText: According to the caller, the accident occurred __________ prior this calling this report in.
According to the caller, the number and gender of the occupants of the vehicle was
The vehicle involved in the accident was described as a
The caller said she saw the vehicle that was involved in the accident

options.text: failed to stop at a red light.
failed to stop at a stop sign.

mcqQuestions.questionText: According to the caller, she saw __________________ bleeding after the accident occurred

options.text: ONLY the passenger in the front seat
both the driver and passenger in the front seat
both the driver and the passenger in the rear seat

emergencyQuestions.questionText: Child is choking on a balloon she was blowing up.
Woman gives poison to her neighbor’s barking pet dog.

captions.CS321:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.700 --> 00:00:01.320
Hi.

2
00:00:01.540 --> 00:00:03.660
My name is Shannon Moreland.

3
00:00:03.940 --> 00:00:11.370
S H A N N O N M O R E L A N D.

7
00:00:12.040 --> 00:00:13.900
I am an employee at a convenience

8
00:00:13.901 --> 00:00:17.610
store at 7 3 4 4 Nigel

10
00:00:18.020 --> 00:00:19.486
N I G E L

11
00:00:20.680 --> 00:00:22.890
in the town of Northvale

12
00:00:23.140 --> 00:00:27.300
N O R T H V A L E.

14
00:00:27.910 --> 00:00:29.520
I am really frustrated.

15
00:00:29.920 --> 00:00:31.149
I tried calling the owner

16
00:00:31.150 --> 00:00:33.240
but her husband said she wasn't
home.

17
00:00:33.850 --> 00:00:35.610
There were three guys here you know.

18
00:00:35.980 --> 00:00:37.760
They came in to buy beer.

19
00:00:38.320 --> 00:00:40.350
Boy, were they high on something

20
00:00:40.840 --> 00:00:41.980
they paid for the beer

21
00:00:41.981 --> 00:00:43.320
with the travelers check.

22
00:00:43.780 --> 00:00:45.830
They got mad when I told them I
couldn't take

23
00:00:45.831 --> 00:00:47.740
the traveler's checks unless they
had a current

24
00:00:47.741 --> 00:00:48.800
driver's license.

25
00:00:49.090 --> 00:00:50.850
And the guy with the travelers check

26
00:00:51.070 --> 00:00:52.930
said he only had an expired driver's

27
00:00:52.931 --> 00:00:53.580
license.

28
00:00:54.220 --> 00:00:56.259
I was afraid so I took the travelers

29
00:00:56.260 --> 00:00:57.450
check anyway.

30
00:00:57.810 --> 00:00:59.830
But I wrote down the guy's license
plate

31
00:00:59.831 --> 00:01:01.690
number that was on his ratty old

32
00:01:01.691 --> 00:01:02.760
Ford sedan.

33
00:01:03.220 --> 00:01:08.490
It is 8 J K U 8 5 7.

36
00:01:08.950 --> 00:01:10.840
They even asked me to meet them at

37
00:01:10.841 --> 00:01:12.730
the Playhouse bar after I got off

38
00:01:12.731 --> 00:01:13.840
work at 8pm.

39
00:01:14.740 --> 00:01:16.410
Look they just left

40
00:01:17.020 --> 00:01:18.219
as they were driving away.

41
00:01:18.220 --> 00:01:20.260
They almost ran headfirst into a red

42
00:01:20.261 --> 00:01:21.780
truck with their green car.

43
00:01:22.360 --> 00:01:24.450
I'm afraid they're going to hurt
somebody.

44
00:01:25.150 --> 00:01:27.010
Oh yeah the stupid guy left

45
00:01:27.011 --> 00:01:28.680
his driver's license behind.

46
00:01:29.030 --> 00:01:35.190
It's number is S 8 4 2 3 7 8 2
captions.CS322:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.690 --> 00:00:01.280
Hi.

2
00:00:01.470 --> 00:00:03.200
This is Sally Malone again.

3
00:00:03.480 --> 00:00:05.750
S A L L Y

4
00:00:06.030 --> 00:00:08.430
M A L O N E.

6
00:00:09.090 --> 00:00:11.240
I know you guys will be glad to hear
from me.

7
00:00:11.610 --> 00:00:13.590
My husband says I should write a
story

8
00:00:13.591 --> 00:00:15.350
about all of the stuff I see.

9
00:00:16.020 --> 00:00:17.995
I live it 14 61

10
00:00:18.390 --> 00:00:22.350
Elder E L D E R in the village

12
00:00:22.351 --> 00:00:26.600
of Linbrook L I N B R O O K.

14
00:00:27.420 --> 00:00:29.310
My neighbors in the house next door
are

15
00:00:29.311 --> 00:00:30.380
on vacation.

16
00:00:30.870 --> 00:00:32.460
I saw them leave last Wednesday

17
00:00:32.461 --> 00:00:33.530
with suitcases.

18
00:00:33.990 --> 00:00:35.450
There should be no one home.

19
00:00:35.880 --> 00:00:37.130
There's this vehicle.

20
00:00:37.320 --> 00:00:38.640
I mean a suspicious kid

21
00:00:38.641 --> 00:00:40.500
with long frizzy brown hair hanging

22
00:00:40.501 --> 00:00:41.730
around in the backyard.

23
00:00:42.300 --> 00:00:44.400
I know it's not my neighbor's kid
because

24
00:00:44.401 --> 00:00:46.190
their kid was 15

25
00:00:46.320 --> 00:00:48.209
when they moved in five years ago

26
00:00:48.210 --> 00:00:50.130
and this kid looks at least 5

27
00:00:50.131 --> 00:00:52.160
years older than their kid does now

28
00:00:52.590 --> 00:00:54.710
and their kids have short blonde
hair.

29
00:00:54.840 --> 00:00:55.460
Oh yeah.

30
00:00:55.770 --> 00:00:57.149
Yardy has my phone number

31
00:00:57.150 --> 00:01:02.480
but here it is anyway 6 4 9 8 3 4 9.

34
00:01:03.390 --> 00:01:05.219
I know the last time I called it
turned out

35
00:01:05.220 --> 00:01:07.080
to be something really big a

36
00:01:07.081 --> 00:01:08.480
homicide or something.

37
00:01:09.030 --> 00:01:10.880
Maybe it's nothing this time

38
00:01:10.940 --> 00:01:12.710
that maybe it's something important.

39
00:01:13.230 --> 00:01:15.150
It's just that I know this kid

40
00:01:15.151 --> 00:01:16.970
doesn't belong in this neighborhood.

41
00:01:17.670 --> 00:01:19.740
Especially with that new orange
truck

42
00:01:19.741 --> 00:01:22.049
with green stripes painted on the
sides.

43
00:01:22.050 --> 00:01:24.699
I saw him parked in front of 14

44
00:01:24.700 --> 00:01:26.260
84 mission.

45
00:01:27.030 --> 00:01:29.550
I saw the guy drop his vehicle
registration

46
00:01:29.551 --> 00:01:30.140
form

47
00:01:30.450 --> 00:01:32.340
and I have his vehicle
identification

48
00:01:32.341 --> 00:01:44.460
number I M K J P 5 8 4 3 D 6 9 8 3 8 G T.

54
00:01:45.330 --> 00:01:47.280
Maybe you could check this guy out
as soon

55
00:01:47.281 --> 00:01:47.990
as possible.
captions.CS323:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.540 --> 00:00:03.200
My name is Allison Winston

2
00:00:03.720 --> 00:00:10.685
A L L I S O N W I N S T O N.

6
00:00:11.550 --> 00:00:13.410
I'm calling from my house in the
city of

7
00:00:13.411 --> 00:00:17.660
Tiloson T I L O S O N

9
00:00:18.270 --> 00:00:22.902
where I live at 5 9 2 4 1 Charter

11
00:00:23.400 --> 00:00:26.810
C H A R T E R.

13
00:00:27.510 --> 00:00:29.870
Have you had any reports of an
accident?

14
00:00:30.510 --> 00:00:32.869
How can you guys didn't show up when
it happened?

15
00:00:33.540 --> 00:00:35.729
I was at the carwash on South Street

16
00:00:35.730 --> 00:00:37.470
vacuuming out my Toyota.

17
00:00:37.920 --> 00:00:39.929
You know the one on South Street

18
00:00:39.930 --> 00:00:41.930
and not the one on Huntington
Street.

19
00:00:42.510 --> 00:00:44.799
Anyway I saw a green Nissan

20
00:00:44.800 --> 00:00:46.070
run a traffic light

21
00:00:46.140 --> 00:00:48.410
and swerve right into a telephone
pole.

22
00:00:48.780 --> 00:00:50.730
It all happened about 15 minutes

23
00:00:50.731 --> 00:00:51.320
ago.

24
00:00:51.750 --> 00:00:53.780
The car's license plate number is

25
00:00:54.210 --> 00:00:57.930
A M J 7 8 4 2.

27
00:00:58.560 --> 00:01:01.070
The driver of the car seemed to be
OK,

28
00:01:01.260 --> 00:01:03.150
but I don't think she's all there if
you know

29
00:01:03.151 --> 00:01:04.010
what I mean.

30
00:01:04.349 --> 00:01:05.610
She must be drugged out

31
00:01:05.611 --> 00:01:08.090
or something because she keeps
talking to herself.

32
00:01:08.610 --> 00:01:10.470
The girl in the passenger seat must
have

33
00:01:10.471 --> 00:01:12.360
been bounced around quite a bit
since she

34
00:01:12.361 --> 00:01:13.580
didn't seem to be cut.

35
00:01:15.870 --> 00:01:17.940
The girl in the passenger seat must

36
00:01:17.941 --> 00:01:20.009
have been bounced around quite a bit

37
00:01:20.010 --> 00:01:21.650
since she seemed to be cut.

38
00:01:22.500 --> 00:01:24.140
There is blood everywhere.

39
00:01:24.660 --> 00:01:25.890
I felt sorry for her

40
00:01:25.891 --> 00:01:27.750
but she kept telling me she didn't
want

41
00:01:27.751 --> 00:01:28.540
any help

42
00:01:29.070 --> 00:01:30.960
and the guy in the backseat looked
really

43
00:01:30.961 --> 00:01:33.180
pale like he'd smacked his head on
something

44
00:01:33.181 --> 00:01:34.850
because it was all bruised up.

45
00:01:35.310 --> 00:01:37.170
He kept saying he didn't want the
cops

46
00:01:37.171 --> 00:01:39.150
to find out that he had run away

47
00:01:39.151 --> 00:01:39.980
from home.

48
00:01:40.590 --> 00:01:42.480
If you need to call me back my
telephone

49
00:01:42.481 --> 00:01:47.060
number is 9 2 7 1 4 0 7.

51
00:01:47.340 --> 00:01:48.150
Please hurry.
